School conjuration (healing)

Level cleric 0, druid 0, inquisitor 0, paladin 1, witch 0

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Will half (harmless)

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions personal, selected

If the target of a wordspell with this effect word is dying, it is automatically stabilized.
name: Soothing Touch
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Healing Words/Soothing Touch

sections.body: The target of a wordspell with this effect word is cured of the shaken, sickened, or fatigued condition (caster's choice). Boosting this effect word increases its level by 1.
sections.name: Boost
